text: Douglas Kent Hall (December 12, 1938 â€“ March 30, 2008) was an American writer and photographer. He was known for taking pictures during the Vietnam War-era and at Woodstock. Hall took famous pictured of Jimi Hendrix and Jim Morrison. Hall was born in Vernal, Utah. Hall died suddenly of cardiac arrest in his Albuquerque, New Mexico home, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:American photographers Category:Writers from Utah
title: Douglas Kent Hall
